tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mining_activities (
  user_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date TIMESTAMP,
  activity_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mining_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    miner_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    block_height INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_blocks (
    block_height INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(64),
    prev_block_hash VARCHAR(64),
    miner_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    recipient_id INT,
    amount FLOAT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE mining_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT NOT NULL,
    miner_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    reward DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT NOT NULL,
    receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Miners (
    miner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    miner_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    mining_power FLOAT NOT NULL,
    company_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES Mining_Companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address TEXT NOT NULL,
    receiver_address TEXT NOT NULL,
    amount FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
